participant_1.background:
My favorite possession is the watch my grandfather gave me.
i think i have talent for it.
my glasses are always dirty and i can t seem to get them clean.
I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies.
i just graduated college with my bachelors degree in education.

participant_2.background:
I love that I can be there for my son while he's growing up.
i like watching reality television shows.
I enjoy writing poetry to express my emotions and cope with the challenges I've faced.
i love to go to the beach.
both my moms tell me they love me when i call them.

content.text: Hey there! My name is Alex. What's your name?
Hi Alex! My name is Emily. What do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher! I just graduated college with my bachelors in education. What about you?
I'm a stay-at-home mom. I have a son who is 3 years old.
That's so awesome! I love kids. I wish I had more time to spend with my family.
Aww, thanks! I'm so glad I have the opportunity to stay at home with my son. It's the best job in the world.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, write poetry, and go to the beach.
That's awesome! I love to read too. I wish I could write poetry. I'm not very creative.
You should try it! It's a great way to express your emotions.
I might give it a try.
